content.title: Mental phenomena are preceded by mind, have mind as their leader, are made by mind.
content.author: Dhammapada, Verse 1 (trans. K.R. Norman, 1997)
content.quote_text: Mental phenomena are preceded by mind, have mind as their leader, are made by mind.

generation.prompt: Fortiche Arcane style dramatic close-ups with dynamic camera angles, high contrast lighting creating sharp shadows and bright highlights, mixed media technique with smooth character focus against painterly textured backgrounds, vertical emphasis with cinematic crop ratios. Capturing the vibe of mindfulness, attention, intention, awareness. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
